attributes.action: Give 16 year olds the ability to gain a full driving license
attributes.additional_details: Commuting on public transport is too unreliable and to access my next level of education I feel as though I require a license
attributes.background: Reduce the age of the full license from 18 to 16

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/598776
